titles.title: Honoring the life and legacy of the Honorable Martin Olav Sabo as an outstanding public servant dedicated to the State of Minnesota and the United States.
Honoring the life and legacy of the Honorable Martin Olav Sabo as an outstanding public servant dedicated to the State of Minnesota and the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary:
Declares that the House of Reprresentatives:
honors the life and accomplishments of the Honorable Martin Olav Sabo, former Representative from Minnesota; and remembers the work he accomplished to balance the federal budget and improve the quality of life of all Americans.
